Method Detail

renderer

public Laser3D renderer()
Get the renderer that processing can use with beginRaw() and endRaw(). So one can draw stuff on the laser with the processing syntax.

Returns:
a reference to the renderer

getRenderer

public Laser3D getRenderer()
Same as renderer()

See Also:

public OptimizerSettings settings()

setSettingsRef

dispose

public void dispose()
Cleans up when the processing applet exits. Gets called automatically. Do not worry.

drawDebugView

public void drawDebugView()
Draws a very crude (for now) debug view that shows what the Optimizer generates
